Religious Minorities
Exclusive: New Protections for Jewish Places in Iran to Foil Vigilante Attacks
October 17, 2023
1 min read
Iranian authorities have increased security at synagogues and other Jewish sites amid Israel’s military campaign against Palestinian militant group Hamas in the Gaza Strip, IranWire has learned
The authorities believe that any attack against Iranian Jews would destroy the Islamic Republic’s recent “foreign policy achievements,” including the ongoing diplomatic rapprochement between Tehran and Riyadh, one source said
